Function Documentation

void I2C_EEPROM_BufferRead ( u8 *  pBuffer,
u8  ReadAddr,
u16  NumByteToRead 
)

Read numbers of sequential data from EEPROM.

Parameters:
pBuffer: a pointer pointing to data destination buffer.
ReadAddr: source EEPROM address.
NumByteToRead: numbers of byte.
Return values:
None
